name: TrustSphere
tag_list: enterprise, isp, service-provider, communications, messaging, email, it, spam, ddos, spearphishing, spear-phishing
overview:
TrustSphere provides enterprises – particularly in heavily regulated industry sectors such as healthcare, finance and government – a trust-based technology solution that protects organizations from some of today’s most difficult to handle email-based threats.

TrustSphere is a pioneer in Messaging Intelligence, a next-generation approach to ensuring the security, integrity and reliability of the messaging systems that organizations rely upon. The company was recognized as a 2011 Cool Vendor by Gartner Group and its award-winning solutions have been successfully deployed by both large corporations and major government organizations, proving their industry-leading capabilities. TrustSphere’s solutions are available through a growing number of value-added resellers and systems integrators across the globe. The company has offices throughout the world, including Singapore, New York, Sydney, Tokyo and London.
